description: Number of primitive (aperiodic) step shifted (decimated) sequences using exactly two different symbols.
comments: See A056371 for an explanation of step shifts.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: Sum mu(d)*A056376(n/d) where d divides n.
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
